short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the content of the Berlin police website for demonstrations in a more readable way.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
